::FireBlade::
Even in his angered state Najah was too close not to damage. His armor
cracked a little too much as 15 of the shots hit him.  Knoking him
forward. he turned.
" I am tired of petty bots trying to hurt me!!" he yelled as he
pointed his sword straight at Najah and all of a sudden a huge flame
fired out of the tip right at Nahja.
